LanguageData.VFEE_Turret_StrikerTurret.label: облогова турель
LanguageData.VFEE_Turret_StrikerTurret.description: A redesigned cargo pod designed to bury stabilizing legs upon impact and deploy a powerful turret. Has a limited battery and ammunition pool, and will self-destruct if either run out or it is sufficiently damaged.
LanguageData.VFEE_Gun_StrikerTurret.label: ударна турель
LanguageData.VFEE_Gun_StrikerTurret.description: A powerful turret mounted on the striker drop pod.
